title: Beyond Meat, Sea, MillerKnoll, GM: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Beyond Meat’s plant-based chicken will be sold in KFC restaurants; Tencent cut its stake in Sea
body:
Stock futures are wavering ahead of the release of minutes from the Federal Reserve’s latest policy meeting. Here’s what’s moving in Wednesday’s trading:
